Eggs.title: Make eggs for breakfast
boiled: Fill pot with water, enough to cover egg
Turn stove to high setting, wait until water starts to boil
Remove pot from stove, let stand for a few minutes
Cool eggs under tap water, peel, eat
scrambled: Place pan on stove set to high
Wait until pan is hot, then add egg
Stir with spatula until egg is cooked

Bacon.title: Cook the bacon
text: Place pan on stove set to high
Remove when lightly browned and enjoy

Toast.title: Don't burn the toast
text: Put slice of bread in toaster
with peanut butter: Spread peanut button onto warm toast
